titleStmt.title: A true relation of the famous & renowmed [sic] victorie latelie atchieued by the counte Maurice of Nassau, neere to Newport in Flaunders against the arch-duke Albertus with the names of such noblemen & others of acount, as haue bin eyther slaine or taken prisoners in this seruice late-done and y [sic] performed. Truly translated out of the Dutch copie.
titleStmt.author: Maurice, Prince of Orange, 1567-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ralph Blower, for C. B[urby],

notesStmt.note: Publication date and publisher's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
